name: Henna's Wing
description:
Jam Context: the project was made in small gamejam with some of the members of the studio. Everyone worked (or tried to) on it for around 5 days and our programmer worked on it 2 days more.

The game: A neon-themed platformer with some environmental hazards to traverse through. Jump and dash around evading lasers and robots, parry turrent shots even in mid-air. A small and quick experience, with a lot of neon.
